welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Selcuk, a charming and historical city known for its rich culture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that Selcuk has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for all international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal for all domestic flights within Turkey.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by providing their email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Cigli AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: The WiFi network is free for all passengers and has good coverage throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Samos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
